body.name: ShineTech Led Desk Lamp for Office Home, Bright Double Head Desk Light with Clamp, Architect Task Lamp 50 Lighting Modes Adjustable Flexible Gooseneck
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 22 mins
features: ✅【Ultra Wide, Large, and Bright] Our desk lamp is equipped with an adjustable double head design, the unfolded LED bar is super wide-spanning 31.5 inches across and can illuminate an entire large desk up to 71 inches in width. The total height of the desk light reaches 26.7 inches, compatible with most laptops and computer monitors. This task lamp can be used as a side lamp when you like to read or work at different angles and it also enhances focus on a particular object or area.

✅【50 Adjustable Lighting Possibilities】 Easily controlled by sensitive press buttons, 5 color temperature modes (3000K - 6000K), each color has 10 brightness levels(10-100%), allowing you to customize the lamp according to your need ambient brightness without flickering, freezing, or screen glare. Different lighting modes fit the needs of different scenes. Great for office work, home tasks, reading, writing, studying, sewing, architectural drawing, drafting, crocheting, crafting, painting, etc.

✅【Auto-off Timer & Memory Function】 Our clamp lamp features a memory function that preserves your previous lighting mode, including your preferred light color and brightness settings. This ensures that your lighting preferences are effortlessly maintained without the need to adjust them every time you use the lamp. Additionally, the desk lamps are available with 10 and 45-minute automatic off-timers, allowing you to enjoy nighttime reading without the worry of falling asleep with the light on.

✅【Flexible Gooseneck & Installation】360°gooseneck and 180°lamp head, affording you the flexibility to adjust the LED table lamp to any angle that suits your lighting needs best. The installation process is easy and simple, no additional tools are required. Remember to remove the lamp head's protective film before use. A sturdy metal clamp can easily secure itself to tabletop edges up to 2.9 inches thick, and a delicate silicone pad inside the clamp to effectively avoid scratching your table.

✅【Quality Warranty】ShineTech consistently offers top-notch office desk lamps renowned for their superior quality and an extended lifespan of up to 50,000 hours. Your satisfaction is our utmost concern. It will be a perfect gift for your friends and family this Christmas. If you have any questions or encounter any issues, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are committed to providing prompt and effective solutions to any challenges you may face.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fits Perfectly For L-Shaped Desk One desk lamp for multi-task, super flexible and easy to control where the light will go in a wide area, adjust to the directions you want.

Double Head Led Desk Lamp Double head design allows for a 180° adjustment of the light bar, extending up to 31.5 inches to provide ample, comfortable illumination for your workspace. Additionally, the work light has a total height of 26.7 inches, making it compatible with most laptops and computer monitors. Super Large Clamp for Your Desk Compared to some desk lights available in the market, our office lamp features a sturdy clamp that is notably larger and wider. It can securely grip desk edges with a maximum thickness of up to 2.9 inches, and we've added a delicate silicone pad inside the clamp to effectively prevent any scratches on your table. Flexible Gooseneck The flexible lamp body allows you to adjust the desk lamp to any angle that suits your lighting needs best. It is suitable for various applications, including office work, study, design, architectural drawing, reading, and artwork. Practical Button Control You can effortlessly manage the lamp through advanced controls, all from the convenience of your desk, without the need to get up or move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The light was easy to assemble, the on/off switch with the timer is well designed. The light brightness and color change was exactly what I was looking for. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars big and bright
reviews.reviewText: I made the mistake of not looking at the measurements before purchasing. I work from home and have lots of meetings online. I've been trying for a while to get the lighting just right. I happened across this product while scrolling in an effort to level up my lighting game. And even though it's taller/wider than I thought - I've received more compliments of my lighting for zooms/virtual meetings in the last month than ever. Lots of lighting options, and can bend to help fit some various spaces. My only suggestion for the developers would be to have a larger base to attach on a desk to give the product a little more stability so it doesnt wiggle as much when the desk is bumped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Work Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I use this for a work bench area and it is perfect for my needs. Small footprint on the desk and is high enough to give me clear light exactly where i needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for desk work light
reviews.reviewText: I really like this light. I bought a couple different lights before. None of them fit desk work well. This light provide different brights and cover whole desk, and give enough light for my two PCs. The size is perfect fit my desk. Strong recommended to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light for a great price.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a light that would cover a lot of my desk that I recently purchased. I found this option and am very pleased. Price was good as well. It has a lot of functions that allow for different lighting and does not disappoint. I watched a review video of someone that had to tape theirs together, but mine was fine but you have to make sure you flip it correctly or they do not go together. Anyway. Good product and is very sturdy and does not sag. Very adjustable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This light is awesome! My desk is 96 inches long this light covers it perfect more than half way across my desk. Love the different settings and the timer works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, the quality appears to be good so far, the neck is flexible, the size is perfect, good value for the money, the versatility to use anywhere is really nice feature...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: My wife had several of this brand around the for different application and suggested it for my computer desk. What a difference it makes
